954820.name: Unforeseen Incidents Soundtrack
954820.description:
Unforeseen Incidents - Official Game Soundtrack

Once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory. "Unforeseen Incidents - Official Game Soundtrack" features 35 tracks with over 80 minutes of original music! - by Tristan Berger.

To access the Soundtrack from Steam: select 'Unforeseen Incidents' -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Unforeseen Incidents - Original Soundtrack'

Track listing

1. Harper Pendrell
2. The Fever
3. Yelltown
4. Hotel
5. Bar
6. The Rancho Health Corporation
7. The Attack
8. Greystone Woods
9. Boondocks
10. Farm

22. Serenity
23. Aquila
24. Dr. Rancho
25. The Kidnapping
26. Solitude
27. Kahona (Title)
28. Aquila Rising
29. Betrayal
30. Induction
31. The Virus
32. The Truth
33. The Escape
34. Requiem
35. Unforeseen Incidents
